original_text: And the foundations of the thresholds shook at the voice of him who called, and the house was filled with smoke.
korean_text: 이같이 화답하는 자의 소리로 말미암아 문지방의 터가 요동하며 성전에 연기가 충만한지라

sentences.original_text: And the foundations of the thresholds shook
at the voice of him who called
and the house was filled with smoke
